General.Name: Tatung Co
General.Description: Tatung Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides power, consumer, and system solutions in Taiwan, China, rest of Asia, Europe, and the United States. The company operates through four segments: Optoelectronics; Machinery, Energy, and System; Consumer Products; and Real Estate Development. It offers products and services, such as steel manufacturing machinery, industrial appliances, household appliances, refrigerators, air conditioners, metal processing machineries, electronic products, wires and cables, chemicals, cookware products, wood-made products, plastics, office equipment, audio products, precision meters, and transmission equipment. The company also provides products and services that include transportation facilities, health care products, microbe fermentation products, construction, furniture products, solar wafers, water treatment engineering, telecommunication equipment, parking facilities, automation machinery, semiconductors, and real estate development and leasing. In addition, it engages in publishing magazines, as well as offering customs brokerage; the general import and export business; and development and leasing of industrial parks. The company was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 22, Zhongshan North Road, Taipei, Taiwan
